changeSet.author: jhmoreno
changeSet.sql: SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[Reporte] ON GO INSERT [dbo].[Reporte] ([Id], [EstadoRegistro], [CreadoPor], [FechaCreacion], [ModificadoPor], [FechaModificacion], [EliminadoPor], [FechaEliminacion], [Alias], [Nombre], [Descripcion], [SubcategoriaId], [Link], [Path], [Formato], [Extension], [Alto], [Ancho], [EsModal], [VistaGeneracion]) VALUES (3, N'Activo ', N'sistema', CAST(N'2020-06-03T15:16:00' AS SmallDateTime), NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL, N'ejemplo', N'EjemploBuenasPracticas', N'Prueba de Formato con parametros', 1, N'http://172.16.1.26:8189/ReportServer/Pages/ReportViewer.aspx?%2fEjemploBuenasPracticas&rs:Command=Render', N'EjemploBuenasPracticas', N'PDF', N'PDF', N'11in', N'8.5in', 0, 'ejemplo') GO SET IDENTITY_INSERT [dbo].[Reporte] OFF GO

rollback.sql: DELETE FROM [dbo].[Reporte] WHERE Id IN (3) GO
